pullRequest.body:
This PR adds `PreservesColimits/PreservesLimits` instances for adjoint functors.

---

nodes.body:
LGTM

Feel free to just remove the instance `Profinite.preserves_smaller_limits_toTopCat` at the top of the file `Profinite/CofilteredLimit`, it's not necessary anymore. I just added it to the file when I was making the results more universe polymorphic.

Pull request successfully merged into master.
